text: The Pat Lowther Memorial Award is an annual award presented by the League of Canadian Poets to the year's best book of poetry by a Canadian woman."Pat Lowther Memorial Award". The Canadian Encyclopedia, March 13, 2012. The award was established in 1980 to honour poet Pat Lowther, who was murdered by her husband in 1975.
